title: The Boy Next Door
description: A coming of age story about faith and courageâ€¦Two adolescent boys, next door neighbors, placed in a crib together since they were born, Brandon Townsend and Zachary Sherman were best friends. Inseparable, they played, studied, and hung-out in their cozy suburban town in New Jersey, until one night their friendship took on a deeper meaning. Months away from their eighteenth birthday, graduating high-school and applying to college, Brandon and Zachary experimented together sexually, tightening their bond until they were soul-mates. With plans of going to the same university, living together at the dorms, and a future of companionship laid out in front of them, their world came crashing down during a fateful trip when both families traveled together to Florida. From that moment on, their plans were destroyed.Ten years later, a chance meeting brings the men together again. Is it too late to connect? Bring back the closeness and trust these two best friends had? Or has the time destroyed the chance for a future relationship for the boy who lived next door?
author: G.A. Hauser
